name: Black Space
description:
An arena space shooter has just arrived to you!


This small game is a 2D singleplayer space shooter. But instead of an RPG or top-down scrolling game this time it is an arena style game.

So, it is like Quake, but in 2D and with space ships! It is meant for quick time wasting, so you can quickly launch a game, play a bit and then do something else.

Black Space is free, without any costs.

Default keys:
wasd: Move forward/backward & strafe left/right
left/right arrow: Turn ship
space: Fire your weapon
1-0: Select weapon
shift: Use speed boost
tab: Show scores
esc: Pause game and show menu
^: Toggle console

We wish you much fun with the game and hope you can have a relaxed nostalgic time!
